bio.heading: Who is Darío?
description: Since I was little, I've always loved computer science. That's why I decided to study it in the future.
After graduating, I decided to specialize in fields related to artificial intelligence and data analysis, as these were the ones I found most interesting during my studies.
Thanks to this, I've learned a lot of interesting things related to the fields of data science and artificial intelligence.

experience.title: Fullstack Developer
experience.description: Development and maintenance of GVA websites, documentation development, ticket management, and customer request tracking.

experience.title: Technical Engineer
experience.description: 365 and Windows Server administrator. Ticket management and customer request tracking.

experience.title: Support and Implementation Analyst
experience.description: Support and implementation of a hospital management system. Server and database maintenance.

experience.title: Desarrollador de Software
experience.description: Development, support, and implementation of an MES system.

education.description: Currently learning about Artificial Intelligence in this Master! I can't comment much because I am still studying it.

Thanks to this master's degree, I have been able to delve deeper into very interesting topics regarding bioinformatics and biomedical data analysis, as well as learn a great deal about the techniques used in this field. I have also learned very interesting statistical techniques.
This degree gave me the base I needed in computer science to know that I wanted to specialize in data and AI.
